content.rendered:
Kok Onn is a Marine Engineer holding a Class 1 Marine Engineer’s certificate of competency (motor). He also has a Diploma in Mechanical Marine. He has experience in ISM and ISPS related matters and carried out risk assessment audits on shipping companies on behalf of Owners and Leading Underwriters.

Contact

Singapore / Kuala Lumpur | +60 1927 77476

Discipline: Engineer
Specialism: Casualty claim for insurers and owners
Expert Witness Expertise: Technical superintendency testimony
